about: Hello, my name is Selahattin Tolga Pekdemir. I graduated from Kocaeli University's Mechanical Engineering Department in 2022. While continuing my education, I became more interested in the field of software, which I thought was more suitable for me. After graduating, I started to improve myself in this field and started working on projects. I am confident that I am making steady progress towards becoming a Full- Stack developer in the future..
